message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a product that holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact details, I can assure you that it's worth no less than $800000 to me. I believe this product has the potential to be even more valuable to you, given your expertise in [mention Bob's area of expertise, if known]. I'm confident you'll recognize its worth.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a substantial offer considering the product's intrinsic value. Please let me know your decision.
